name: Deadly Monologue
description:
A one-week prototype for the GSAS 4510 Experimental Game Design course at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. The theme of this project is "Voice".  A short demo of the project can be found here.

How to Play

  1. This game uses 3D audio, so headphones are highly recommended.
  2. Listen carefully to the monologue to pinpoint the direction it is coming from.
  3. Hit the red pill by shooting in the direction of the voice to prevent it from touching you. Each shot briefly reveals the area around you.
  4. Missing too many consecutive shots will run you out of bullets, so shoot wisely!
  5. Try to survive by listening through the entire monologue without getting caught.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move around
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire gun
  • ESC - Return to menu

Sources

  • Gun Model by Tuhin Karfa
  • Background Ambience by Into The Void Sound Design
  • Gridbox Texture by Ciathyza
  • Help Me font by GGBotNet
  • RPI Copypastas generated via ChatGPT with prompts written by Corppet
  • Pitch Presentation by Brian Upton and GDC
  • All other assets and source code by Corppet

P.S. The downloadable build has an easter egg. Good luck finding it. :)
